mapper.insert:
insert into Doc_Order_Header( orderno, customerid,
soreference1,
soreference2,
ordertime, expectedshipmenttime1, priority, consigneeid, consigneename,
c_province,
c_city,
c_address2,
c_address1,
c_zip,
sostatus, ordertype,
userdefine1,
userdefine2,
userdefine3,
userdefine4,
userdefine5,
userdefine6,
notes,
c_tel1,
c_tel2,
releasestatus, warehouseid, createsource, addtime, addwho, edittime, editwho ) values( #{orderno}, #{customerid},
#{soreference1},
#{soreference2},
sysdate, sysdate, '1', #{consigneename}, #{consigneename},
#{cProvince},
#{cCity},
#{cAddress2},
#{cAddress1},
#{cZip},
'00', #{ordertype},
#{userdefine1},
#{userdefine2},
#{userdefine3},
#{userdefine4},
#{userdefine5},
#{userdefine6},
#{notes},
#{cTel1},
#{cTel2},
#{releasestatus}, #{warehouseid}, #{addwho}, sysdate, #{addwho}, sysdate, #{editwho} )
mapper.update:
update Doc_Order_Header set ordertype=#{ordertype}, releasestatus=#{releasestatus}, consigneeid=#{consigneename}, consigneename=#{consigneename}, c_address1=#{cAddress1}, c_tel1=#{cTel1},
notes=#{notes},
soreference1=#{soreference1},
soreference2=#{soreference2},
userdefine1=#{userdefine1},
userdefine2=#{userdefine2},
userdefine3=#{userdefine3},
userdefine4=#{userdefine4},
userdefine5=#{userdefine5},
userdefine6=#{userdefine6},
edittime=sysdate, editwho=#{editwho} where orderno=#{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Doc_Order_Header set
addwho=#{addwho},
allocationcount=#{allocationcount},
archiveflag=#{archiveflag},
billingid=#{billingid},
billingname=#{billingname},
b_address1=#{bAddress1},

door=#{door},

where orderno = #{orderno}
mapper.select: select c.descr_c as customerid, a.orderno as orderno, b.soreference1, b.soreference2, b.soreference3, g.total_qty as totalQty, g.total_grossweight as totalGrossWeight, g.total_cube as totalCube, b.notes, a.sku, d.descr_c as skuName, a.packid, d.reservedfield01 as uom, sum(a.qty) as qtyallocated, a.location, f.lotatt01, f.lotatt02, f.lotatt03, row_number() over(order by a.orderno, e.picklogicalsequence, a.sku) as orderlineno from ACT_Allocation_Details a, Doc_Order_Header b, Bas_Customer c, Bas_Sku d, Bas_Location e, Inv_Lot_Att f, (select x.orderno, sum(x.qty) total_qty, sum(x.qty * nvl(y.grossweight, 0)) total_grossweight, sum(x.qty * nvl(y.cube, 0)) total_cube from Act_Allocation_Details x, Bas_Sku y where x.customerid = y.customerid and x.sku = y.sku and x.orderno = #{0} group by x.orderno) g where a.customerid = c.customerid and a.customerid = d.customerid and a.sku = d.sku and a.orderno = b.orderno and a.location = e.locationid(+) and a.lotnum = f.lotnum(+) and a.orderno = g.orderno and a.orderno = #{0} group by c.descr_c, a.orderno, b.soreference1, b.soreference2, b.soreference3, g.total_qty, g.total_grossweight, g.total_cube, b.notes, a.sku, d.descr_c, a.packid, d.reservedfield01, a.location, f.lotatt01, f.lotatt02, f.lotatt03, e.picklogicalsequence
select count(1) from Doc_Order_Details where orderno = #{condition.orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.customerid, a.orderno, a.soreference1, a.soreference2, a.consigneeid, a.c_address1, a.c_tel1, b.orderlineno, b.sku, b.qtyordered, b.qtyshipped, b.price, row_number() over(order by a.orderno, b.orderlineno) as row_num from (select
from Doc_Order_Header ) a, Doc_Order_Details b where a.orderno = b.orderno
select code as ordertype, codename_c as ordertypeName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'SO_TYP' order by show_sequence
select code as sostatus, codename_c as sostatusName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'SO_STS' and udf1 = 'Y' order by show_sequence
select code as releasestatus, codename_c as releasestatusName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'RLS_STS' order by show_sequence
select allocationdetailsid from act_allocation_details where orderno = #{0} and status = '40'
select allocationdetailsid from act_allocation_details where orderno = #{0} and status = '60'
